start.text: ~/may you guide these poor lost souls/~

start_boss.text: ~/For the safety of $shipNameNoPrefix, and all her crew/~

retreat.text: And so begins our great escape.
Let us make haste away from here.

need_help.text: Prayer cannot protect from weapons fire!

running.text: Did Ludd not speak of the meek?
It is better that we die... later.
I shall see you at the regroup, $commanderName.

hull_50.text: My engineering team is at work!
Widespread hull damage. Steady as she goes..
I can see the atmosphere leaking out from my bridge!

hull_30.text: The reactor is starting to take damage!
The hull is failing! We need to retreat!
Ludd's protection only goes so far!

overload.text: Flux overloads are another one of Ludd's great challenges.
The shields have failed us! Damn them!
Another reason to thank the armor...

death.text: Don't you *dare* fire on our lifeboats.

victory.text: Don't chalk it up to luck.

victory_boss.text: We must still have some favor.
This is the power of faith!
